priorVersion.title: CDISC Protocol Entities Study Contact Information Attribute Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C154682

self.title: CDISC Protocol Entities Study Contact Information Attribute Terminology

definition: A terminology value set relevant to the attributes of the study contact information entity.
name: Study Contact Information Attribute Terminology
preferredTerm: CDISC Protocol Entities Study Contact Information Attribute Terminology

terms.definition: An academic rank conferred by a college, university, or other postsecondary education institution as official recognition for the successful completion of a program of studies.

A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.
A text string identifier for a location to which electronic mail can be delivered. (NCI)
A telephone number that is used for identifying a specific fax machine in a telephone network.
The name of the organization or entity that the person or group has an established relationship with.
A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization. (NCI)
The usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event. (NCI)
A sequence of decimal digits (0-9) that is used for identifying a specific telephone line or other device in a telephone network.
